attributes.review: i met president trump and i was so excited till he backhanded me and threw me to the floor. after this occurred he continually spat on me while stomping. as i tried to crawl away he grabbed his maga flag and tied it around my neck and started swinging me across the stadium! i was pregnant at the time too so he basically gave me a personal abortion 😣 if i could give this 0 stars i would .
attributes.title: rude

attributes.review: The app as a whole worked so slow and laggy. Extremely disappointed for it being a presidents app.

attributes.review: It is AWFUL!! It keeps kicking me off and calling me horrible names!! I can’t believe the audacity. It also said that I should meet up with a racist leader and idk guys. Just don’t get it 🧚🏻‍♂️🌸🌺🤠🌼🌺🌸🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.review: Woke up this morning w a horrible horrible cough, I can’t taste, and I feel horrible. This all occurred the next morning after catching a glimpse of this app 😳😳😳 this app is contagious and might give you the corona virus!!! BE CAREFUL!!!!
